description.narrative: The proposed investment consists of an up to US$300 million syndicated pre-export finance facility to support Vicentin S.A.I.C.s working capital needs from exports of oilseed oil and sub-products (the Project).

name.narrative: The P roject area is Santa Fe Province, in Argentina.
